content:
TITLE: Configuring NGINX Build in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Runs the configure script to generate a Makefile for building NGINX. This command should be executed from the NGINX source code repository's root directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
auto/configure
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compiling NGINX from Source in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Compiles NGINX into a binary using the make command. This should be run from the NGINX source root directory after successful execution of the configure script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Compiled NGINX Binary in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Installs the compiled NGINX binary into the system. This command should be run from the NGINX source root directory after successful compilation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo make install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning NGINX GitHub Repository in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Clones the NGINX source code repository from GitHub into the current directory using the git command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/nginx/nginx.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Installed NGINX Binary in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Starts the installed NGINX server using the binary located in the default installation directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking Installed NGINX Modules with Command Line in Bash
DESCRIPTION: This command displays the version of NGINX installed along with all static modules that were compiled into the binary. It's useful for verifying which modules are available in your NGINX installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nginx -V
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Testing NGINX Operation with Curl in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Uses the curl command to test if the installed NGINX server is running correctly by fetching the default welcome page.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl localhost
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing NGINX Dependency Libraries in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Installs the minimal set of dependency libraries needed to build NGINX with rewriting and gzip capabilities using the apt package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo apt install libpcre3-dev zlib1g-dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing OpenSSL Library for NGINX in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Installs the OpenSSL library using the apt package manager. This is required if you plan to use SSL certificates to encrypt traffic with TLS in NGINX.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo apt install libssl-dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Compiler and Make Utility in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Installs the GNU C compiler (gcc) and Make utility using the apt package manager. These tools are essential for building NGINX from source.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo apt install gcc make
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning NGINX Tests Repository Using Git
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the NGINX test suite repository, which should be used to test changes before submitting a pull request to ensure they don't cause regressions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/nginx/nginx-tests.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Package Repository Lists in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Updates the package repository lists using the apt package manager. This is recommended before installing new packages to ensure the latest versions are available.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo apt update
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: NGINX Default Welcome Page HTML
DESCRIPTION: Shows the expected beginning of the HTML output when testing the NGINX installation using curl. This indicates a successful installation and running of the NGINX server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/nginx/nginx/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title>Welcome to nginx!</title>
```
